p: The microorganisms used in this study included Escherichia coli CCM 3988 (EC), Haemophilus influenzae CCM 4457 (HI), Shigella sonnei CCM 1373, Yersinia enterocolitica CCM 5671, Staphylococcus aureus subs. aureus CCM 4223 (SS) and Streptococcus pneumoniae CCM 4501 (SP). All of the bacterial strains were purchased from Czech Collection of Microorganisms (Brno, Czech Republic) and were for antibacterial activity. The pure bacterial cultures were then incubated in Mueller Hinton broth (MHB, Oxoid, Basingstoke, UK) at 37 Â°C for 24 h.
